name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit , Includes 2 Batteries, Charger and Bag (DCK240C2)

short_description: Impact Wrench with Brushless Motor : Our 3/4 inch impact wrench built in a brushless motor that can reach up to 2800rpm, with low noise, stable performance, strong power, and long service life. Impact Gun with 2 × 4000mAh Batteries : Battery life is the biggest issue with cordless impact wrench, so we upgraded to two 21V 4.0Ah high-capacity batteries. It takes only 2 hours to fully charge a single battery, and the unloaded operating time for a single battery is 45 minutes. Our battery has an 60A overload protection function. When the current exceeds this value, the protection device will cut off the power supply to prevent damage to the motor and battery due to overload, making your work more reassuring

Bi-directional Modes & 3 Speed : The battery impact gun has two modes forward and reverse. The forward mode can tighten the bolt, while the reverse mode can remove the nut or bolt. Our brushless electric impact wrench has 3 adjustable gears, low gear can be used for furniture installation and DIY creation, medium gear can be used for mounting brackets or frames, and high gear can be used for heavy-duty work installation and maintenance

Power Impact Wrench with Reverse Auto Stop Mode : Our impact driver is equipped with a reverse self stop function. In reverse mode, press the "Mode" switch on the gear display screen to activate the reverse self stop mode. Pull the speed trigger, and once the nut or bolt loosens, the brake stop device will start and reduce speed and torque to prevent the nut from flying into nowhere to grab. Press the "Mode" switch again to turn off RSS mode

Warm Tips : When receive our battery impact wrench, first fully charge the battery to activate it. When the power impact gun is operated under load for a long time, the motor may become hot, which is normal. Please do not worry.
